sentences.en: A : Clipper arrives in New York first.
sentences.cn: 克利皮尔火车首先到达纽约.

sentences.en: Billy: That's my travel - nail clipper set.
sentences.cn: 比利: 那是我的旅游指甲剪组.

sentences.en: Go easy with the electric clipper. I just want a trim.
sentences.cn: 电剪拿轻一点, 我只是要修剪一下.

sentences.en: He clipped off the few hairs of his spare beard with a fingernail clipper.
sentences.cn: 他用一把指甲剪剪去几根胡须.

sentences.en: I can use a nail clipper to cut my fingernails.
sentences.cn: 我会用指甲刀剪我的手指甲.

sentences.en: Pencil Lead, Eraser, Glue, Pencil, An Pen Clip, Clipper Stationery.
sentences.cn: 采购产品铅笔铅, 橡皮擦, 胶水, 铅笔, 钢笔剪辑, 快船文具.

sentences.en: The horse is a clipper. It'll win hands down.
sentences.cn: 这是一匹快马,他毫不费力就可以跑赢.

sentences.en: The length of the clipper from stem to stern is thirty - six feet.
sentences.cn: 这艘快船从船头到船尾全长36英尺.

sentences.en: The pirate ship boarded the clipper.
Typical application: Hair Clipper, Water Pump, Cookie Maker.
sentences.cn: 典型应用: 电吹风、发剪, 水泵, 曲奇饼机.

sentences.en: Warning: Don't lift the clipper with the cord avoiding it enwind.
sentences.cn: 警告: 轧刀不用时,请不要用电源线提轧刀,以避免软线缠绕.

sentences.en: What whisky bears the name of a famous 1870 s clipper ship?
sentences.cn: 哪一种威士忌的名称是1870年的一艘快船的名字?

sentences.en: When you hand clipper, it is located near your thumb.
sentences.cn: 当你手握轧刀时, 此手柄就位于大拇指附近,调节起来非常方便.

sentences.en: You need handkerchiefs, soap and a nail clipper.
sentences.cn: 你需要手绢, 肥皂和指甲刀.
不过你可以从《剪报》上找到他们.

words.tran_cn: 省略一部分的；发音清楚的
头等的，第一流的；极好的，恰好的
剪裁，剪断；剪报，剪辑；剪下物，剪下的东西
快速帆船；大剪刀；剪削者；理发剪

trans.tran_cn: 剪刀，理发剪，剪削者，削取人，（十九世纪的）快速帆船，快马，移动很快的人或物
trans.tran_en: a special tool with two blades, used for cutting small pieces from something
